title: 2 months with iPhone 14 Update! What's on my iPhone!?
description: Thank you to Mailchimp for sponsoring this portion of the video! Check out more here:     Mailchimp's Channel:     PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE -   FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:       WHAT I USE TO MAKE VIDEOS    CAMERAS: Sony a7 IV -  Sony a1 -   Sony a7s III -   Insta 360 ONE X3 -  Insta 360 ONE RS -  Insta 360 GO2 -   LENSES: New Sony GM 24-70mm ii -  Older Sony GM 24-70mm -  New Sony Sony 20-70mm -  Sony GM 16-35mm -  Sony GM 50mm -  Sony GM 135mm -  Sony GM 85mm -   AUDIO:  Sennheiser AVX Digital Wireless -  Sony XLR Adapter -  Sony Hot Shoe Shotgun -  Tiny Sony Microphone -  DJI Mics -  Rode Podcaster Pro II -  Podcaster Mic -  Elgato Wave 3 Mic -   DRONES: DJI Mavic 3 -  DJI Mini 3 -  DJI Air 2S -   LIGHTING: Aputure 600d Pro -  Aputure Light Dome II -  Aputure Amaran 200d -  Aputure 35in Light Dome -  Aputure Lantern Softbox -   Sony CF Express A 160g + Card Reader-  Sony CF Express A 800g -     These links are affiliate and by using them youre helping out my channel! Thank you!     BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:
transcript: - Hey guys, it's Justine, and it has been quite a while since the new iPhone 14 has come out and I am so excited because today we're gonna be doing an update talking about all the things that I've loved, and also showing you what is on my iPhone. Now, before we get into that this portion of the video is sponsored by MailChimp. They're the number one email marketing and automation platform with over 12 million customers that send more than half a billion emails every day. They analyze the data from billions of emails that they send to offer up personalized recommendations that help businesses improve engagement and revenue. Why I'm really excited about partnering with MailChimp is I have been using them for a really long time. Now I haven't recently been active with my mailing list subscribers, but this was one of the first mailing list companies that I ever used when I first started, basically doing any type of internet content. So if you wanna sign up for my new mailing list I'll put a link in the description where you can check it out. I'm super excited about this. I have something planned for the holidays. I haven't figured out 100% yet all what it's gonna be, but I promise you it's gonna be pretty cool. More and more for creators, I think we're trying to find other ways to actually get in touch with people, stay connected, and sort of have that one-on-one relationship. So, again, if you guys wanna check it out, I'll put a link in the description, and if you are someone with a business, or you're a creative who is looking to take their email list to the next level, or maybe even start one for the first time, I definitely recommend MailChimp. You guys can get started at mailchimp.com, and you can also sign up for my mailing list for a fun surprise. Thank you again to MailChimp for sponsoring a portion of this video. So obviously the iPhone has been out for quite a while, and again the iPhone 14 was not a massive update from the 13 but some of the things that they did update in this phone are pretty impressive. Obviously we have the upgraded cameras, and now that the satellite features are finally live I am so excited about this because this will allow you if you're ever in a situation where you don't have access to cell reception, and in case of an emergency satellite will kick in, and you'll be able to call for help. I did get a chance to go and check this out, and really see hands on how this worked, and it was pretty impressive. And as someone who really enjoys going out and hiking in very remote places, and going to national parks where there's never cell reception, this is definitely putting my mind at ease. So now some of the apps that I have been using obviously are as follows. Now I started my phone brand new completely from scratch because I didn't want any of the old apps transferred over to my phone. So here's pretty much what my layout looks like. We've obviously have got our setting, the clock. I've got my app store, we have our calendar. I've got Gmail, and we have Google Maps and Apple Maps. I kind of have them both side by side just because sometimes I wanna use one over the other, and I like knowing that they're right there in the middle of the screen. I can hit them at any time. We've got our notes, YouTube Studio, and the YouTube app. Of course, the Tesla app so that I can use my car. I just realized the other day that it had in the app a way to beep the horn, because I always loved having a key fob. So that's how I would find my car when it was lost, and I was lost in a parking garage, and I was like this has to have a beep. There's gotta be a way to do this. And sure enough, there is. This is my little finance section. This is kind of where I have all of my crypto and money apps. We've got Coinbase Helium, Coinbase Pro, my Rainbow Wallet, Venmo, MetaMask, Public, Phantom, and, of course, the Coinbase Wallet. And we've got some more social media here. We've got Instagram, TikTok, Snapchat, and we've got some smart home apps right here. We've got Nest and Ring, and those are just to control and see my video cameras that I have around the office, and at home. Powerview this is what I use to open and close my blinds in my home. So those are all automated. So have a bunch of Lutron lights so I can control them directly from here. Ghost on that is what I use to control the sprinkler system that I have in my garden. So that's something that I didn't personally set up. But yeah, iRobot, those are my robotic vacuums and Google Home that also connects to my Nest devices. We've got this Shlag which I use to control my smart locks. Nanoleaf, those are to control some of the Nanoleaf flight bulbs that I have in my home. Traeger, of course we've got a smart home grill to go with the smart home oven. I love this grill so much. It's been so much fun to actually cook out. And I'm not gonna lie, I don't even have to lie because I think you can ask my friends to vouch for me. I'm actually not bad at grilling. They've been pretty impressed. Control Center, this is what I use to control my El Gado lights that I have on my streaming desk. And Washose, that is an app that I use to get my car washed. It's incredible, it's like a car wash on demand. Say when you want them to come here and they show up clean your car and ta-da, it's done. Aura, I think we've talked about that before. It's the Aura Ring, which mine's actually charging right now so that's why I'm not wearing it. Telegram, the phone to make phone calls. I know I don't like that app. It's probably my least favorite app on this phone. Which is ironic, the phone app on the phone. I don't like it. We've got WhatsApp, Discord, Spotify and Geno Pets. Also one of my favorite apps, this is my little Geno Pet so he basically tracks my steps every day. Then I bank the steps and then I use the energy that I've gained from the steps to level him up. So we're gonna level up our dude just a little, because then I'm gonna harvest his energy. Then he also connects to the Solana Networks. I have a Habitat on Solana and then I basically use the steps and the energy that I've created to harvest. But it's a whole thing. If you know, you know. Here's my productivity folder. I do like to have that and manually track it 'cause that's what I've been using for so long. And then we have our DGI Go Four app which I use to connect my drone. Those are all of the apps that I currently have on my iPhone. So the case that I decided to rock is this yellow one. So it's really cool to kind of get this dynamic view of wherever it is that I'm going or where I am. And then sometimes on the plane it actually updates.
